serious.title: Snowflake Website
serious.description: This website that is a portfolio for my work. I like to use this website to try-out new technologies and frameworks.

serious.title: TheWeddingApp
serious.description: The perfect wedding app for you, the to-be newly weds, and your guest. Keep them up-to-date about the programme, locations and let them submit their photos.

serious.title: De Punaise
serious.description: Keep-up-to-date with all the news and non-news of Ariston '80

serious.title: MusicGenius
serious.description: The exact details of this project are still kinda secret. So stay tuned!

serious.title: Spot
serious.description: Spot let"s you spot animals all over the world for guides to provide better safari trips. Can you spot them all? NOTE: due to recent changes in the api, the spotting only works under https (which I do not have yet), but you can still see what it does. The login credentials are username: sping & password: sping.

tools.title: MapArrayResponse
tools.description: Little helper to map an array with values from another array. Useful when mapping GraphQL responses from Dataloaders.

tools.title: NodeSocket
tools.description: Nodejs application that allows front-end applications to communicate with sockets. The goal is to have it open for anyone that want to quickly test sockets in their application.

tools.title: Chrome Extension Detector
tools.description: Library that allows the developer to detect whether the user has certain Chrome extensions installed. The list is currently small, but is designed for large expansion.

fun.title: Google Home Hangman
fun.description: Play hangman with your own Google Home.

fun.title: BikeLight
fun.description: An Android application for when you forgot your bikelight. The screen illuminates red (backlight) and the white/yellow flash replaces your front-light. This was my first Android App.
